mapper.select: SELECT u.utility_no utilityNo, u.utility_category utilityCategory, u.utility_name utilityName, u.utility_info utilityInfo, u.createdate, u.updatedate, uf.utility_ori_filename utilityOriFilename, uf.utility_save_filename utilitySaveFilename, uf.utility_filetype utilityFiletype, uf.utility_path utilityPath, FROM utility u LEFT JOIN utility_file uf ON u.utility_no = uf.utility_no WHERE u.utility_no = #{utilityNo}

SELECT u.utility_no utilityNo, u.utility_category utilityCategory, u.utility_name utilityName, u.utility_info utilityInfo, u.createdate, u.updatedate, uf.utility_ori_filename utilityOriFilename, uf.utility_save_filename utilitySaveFilename, uf.utility_filetype utilityFiletype, uf.utility_path utilityPath FROM utility u LEFT JOIN utility_file uf ON u.utility_no = uf.utility_no
AND u.utility_category = '차량'
AND u.utility_category = '회의실'
AND '1' = '1'
ORDER BY u.createdate DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
